original_title: Two-day debate pertaining to LG polls next week
original_body_lines: Leaders of political parties representing Parliament has decided to have a two-day debate on the situation pertaining to the local government elections in the House next week, Parliament media unit said.
Accordingly, the two-day debate will be held on March 9 and 10 from 10.30 am to 5.30 pm each day.
However, no Conesus has been reached on the proposal made by the opposition to allocate funds for the local government election through a resolution.
This request was made by the opposition party members on Tuesday February 28, 2023. (Yohan Perera)
